text:
Hi Support,

We use Apache Tomcat 7.0.62

When we are working on the "sap workforce performance builder wpb" Producer locally we and we are trying to connect a new connection to the manager or checkout objects from the Manager we are receiving a connection error.

Also when working directly on the manager and trying to edit an object or view an object the respond time until the object or group will show is approximately 3-4 min  when it use to be 3-5 seconds.

we get the following error: 
----------------------------------------------------------------------

 
	16-10-30 14:31:56,886|WPB_WARN|http-bio-8443-exec-149|com.datango.pdb.exception.CollaboratorServerException|Exception(500):error creating json#

creator: artems@xact.co.il

text:
There is no evidence of a Tomcat bug here. The client is unexpectedly closing the connection. That is perfectly normal.

The Tomcat users mailing list is the place to seek help with this problem from the Tomcat community.
creator: markt@apache.org
